abstract: According to a new book, former Treasury Secretary Henry Paulson placed an urgent call to JPMorgan Chase C.E.O. Jamie Dimon asking him to buy rival Morgan Stanley just days after the fall of Lehman Brothers.
snippet: According to a new book, former Treasury Secretary Henry Paulson placed an urgent call to JPMorgan Chase C.E.O. Jamie Dimon asking him to buy rival Morgan Stanley just days after the fall of Lehman Brothers.
lead_paragraph: According to a new book, former Treasury Secretary Henry R. Paulson Jr. placed an urgent call to JPMorgan Chase’s  chief executive officer, Jamie Dimon asking him to buy a rival Morgan Stanley, just days after the fall of Lehman Brothers.

headline.main: Book Backs Rumors of Failed Morgan-Morgan Hook-Up
